hints.content: For $\dfrac33$ and $\dfrac66$ to be equivalent, they must be fractions of  the same size whole.
Which image shows $\dfrac33$ and $\dfrac66$ represented on the same size whole?

options.alt: Two hexagons. The hexagons are the same size. There is an equal sign between the hexagons. The top hexagon is divided into three equal parts. All parts are shaded. The bottom hexagon is divided into six equal parts. All parts are shaded. !

Two hexagons. The hexagons are the same size. There is an equal sign between the hexagons. The top hexagon is divided into three equal parts. All parts are shaded. The bottom hexagon is divided into six equal parts. All parts are shaded. !

choices.content: ![Two irregular seven-sided shapes. The shapes are identical, but they are different sizes. There is an equal sign between the shapes. The top shape is big. It is divided into three equal parts. All parts are shaded. The bottom shape is small. It is divided into six equal parts. All parts are shaded. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c9969e3955e03207aefc88fe5e25eacb76583e18)$=$![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/73841441cb55396047cc425e99d359e69fb0f87c)

![Two hexagons. The hexagons are the same size. There is an equal sign between the hexagons. The top hexagon is divided into three equal parts. All parts are shaded. The bottom hexagon is divided into six equal parts. All parts are shaded.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/74751ffaff79e07bc0049b6476484b873e4245e4)$=$![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a1b4b3527e13c3c1f8c8e51e5fc3b091160a5e91)

![Two circles. There is an equal sign between the circles. The top circle is big. It is divided into three equal parts. All parts are shaded. The bottom circle is small. It is divided into six equal parts. All parts are shaded. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/963a8b721be71928648c49f736d281e5e19c24b9)$=$![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/efcd0f2d08bd9523f13d576347f93acbc03b962e)
